description: Whitespace and formatting invariants - no trailing spaces, no trailing newlines

tests.name: produces no trailing newline at end of output
tests.note: Output should not end with newline character

tests.name: maintains proper indentation for nested structures
tests.expected:
user:
  id: 123
  name: Ada
items[2]: a,b
tests.note: 2-space indentation, no trailing spaces on any line
